b08efeb3-8151-4250-ab25-cee9de7240cc.description: Earners of this badge understand how artificial intelligence can be used to transform and enhance the entire employee lifecycle, from recruiting to new hire onboarding, career development, internal talent mobility, performance management and coaching. With this knowledge, they are able to craft a strategy for piloting an application of AI for HR and articulate the benefits to key HR and business unit stakeholders.
b08efeb3-8151-4250-ab25-cee9de7240cc.name: Using AI 4 HR: Certified

alignments.name: SHRM professional development credits (PDCs)
alignments.description: HR professionals who seek SHRM Recertification (required every three years) earn 8 professional development credits (PDCs) for completing this course

alignments.name: HR Certification Institute
alignments.description: HR professionals who seek HRCI Recertification (required every three years) earn 8 professional development credits (PDCs) for completing this course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a five module on-line course on Using AI for HR
Contribute to the online community discussion board
Post assignments in the online course Gallery
Pass several quizzes on course content
Submit an action plan for a potential pilot to use AI for HR
Cumulative time to fully compete all badge requirements = 9 hours.

c208fb16-08b2-43e1-941e-9d011d71d2ec.description: The earner of this badge is capable of seeing the organization through the lens of the employees, identifying key partners to take along the EX journey, understanding the impact of the digital and physical workspace, and measure the business impact of designing a holistic employee experience.
c208fb16-08b2-43e1-941e-9d011d71d2ec.name: Designing a Holistic Employee Experience: Certified

badge_template_activities.title: his course was designed to help you embrace the power of employee experience transformation. Whatever your role, this course will enable you to supercharge your employee experiences, driving results and impacting your organization!

375b5dd8-a7be-493c-90b7-bc5e5cc43f6a.description: Earners of this badge have completed the 5-week Future Workplace Academy online course, viewing videos, reading relevant articles, answering questions, contributing to the course and collaborating with other learners. This includes a discovery assessment to reveal their talents and identify which best align to the 21 HR Jobs of the Future. Assessment feedback will guide learners how to best express and strengthen each of their talents.

c1cbf678-d1d0-4482-933b-3bdc8fb1faa2.name: The Now & The Future of VR, AR, and AI for Learning: Certified

f1364867-38d2-46b2-a35a-eafa31e3e7f9.description: CERTIFICATION IN BUILDING A CULTURE OF CURIOSITY AND LIFELONG LEARNING TO PROMOTE UP-SKILLING AT YOUR ORGANIZATION AND DRIVE BUSINESS VALUE
f1364867-38d2-46b2-a35a-eafa31e3e7f9.name: Building a Culture of Curiosity and Lifelong Learning Certified

badge_template_activities.title: Demystify curiosity and provide tools to analyze one’s own curiosity as well as curiosity in others, explore how organizations can improve their curiosity quotient by taking small yet powerful proactive steps, and reflect on your own workplace environment and to propose specific actions you can recommend to positively embed curiosity into the DNA of your team and your organization.
An online curiosity self-assessment for each individual and a report out of their results is included in the first module of this course.

013eda05-760e-4fda-aed7-6232abd305a5.description: Earners of this badge have learned why employers must care about and learn to nurture the personal wellbeing of their employees and created a strategy reflecting the latest research connecting employee wellbeing and employee engagement, satisfaction, and business productivity considering the seven factors of employee wellbeing and their impact on individuals, teams, and the organization.
013eda05-760e-4fda-aed7-6232abd305a5.name: Nurturing Employee Wellbeing - Certified

37343b2f-e4d5-4855-b63c-9d84bb7cff45.description: Recipients of this badge have completed Developing Business Acumen for L&D Professionals. Led by expert lead faculty, David Vance, Executive Director, Center for Talent Reporting, the course is designed to leave participants with a solid understanding of the fundamentals of business acumen applied to learning.
